articles.author: Ben Collins
articles.title: Copa America final: Chaotic scenes see 'party almost become a tragedy' - BBC.com
articles.description: What went wrong at the 2024 Copa America tournament and what can be learned from the chaotic scenes that marred the final?
articles.content: Before Sunday's final, Colombia coach Nestor Lorenzo had already complained about Colombian popstar Shakira performing a half-time show, meaning the interval would last for 25 minutes rather than 15.… [+1521 chars]
